appName: Save the Land of Fairy Tales
displayName: Save the Land of Fairy Tales
display_name: Save the Land of Fairy Tales
display_long_description:
Each of us as a child read / or watched / fairy tales. A lot of us then dreamed at night and probably dreamed of being able to really move to the world of fairy tales, to actually live in the Castle as a King, or in a house for Barbie. Sometimes it was enough just to close our eyes and we saw ourselves in our favorite fairy tale - we fought dragons, gained treasures, or tamed a wild Unicorn. 

Today, children can easily make their dreams come true! 

Save the Land of Fairy Tales is a VR game that invites children to play the role of a hero saving the Land of Fairy Tales from the Evil Wizard. The plot and the basis of the game are created by a challenge for the child to learn how to use the Secret Power of Mathematics in practice. 

The Evil Wizard has enchanted the Land of Fairy Tales and has taken away the math skills from the inhabitants - they cannot count and use math in their daily lives. The hero of the game, guided by the magic dog Guide, has fun with the game and at the same time learns to understand basic mathematical operations. 

The child's task is to cross the road to the Castle where the Evil Wizard is hiding. There are six enchanted gates waiting for him on the way, to overcome them he must complete several tasks. 

After passing all the gates, the child, using the acquired Math Power and magical items, defeats the Evil Wizard, and as a reward becomes its honorary resident and receives the title of Hero of the Land of Fairy Tales.
